# Model

## Document Retrieval

- TF-IDF + n-gram

## Reading Comprehension

- BiDAF: [Birectional Attention Flow for Machine Comprehension](https://arxiv.org/abs/1611.01603)
- DrQA: [Reading Wikipedia to Answer Open-Domain Questions](https://arxiv.org/abs/1704.00051)
- DocQA: [Simple and Effective Multi-Paragraph Reading Comprehension](https://arxiv.org/abs/1710.10723)
- QANet: [QANet:Combining Local Convolution with Global Self-Attention for Reading Comprehension ](https://arxiv.org/abs/1804.09541)

## Semantic Parsing

- SQLNet: [SQLNet: Generating Structured Queries From Natural Language Without Reinforcement Learning](https://arxiv.org/abs/1711.04436)
